property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60) from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (1,2,3,5,6))

property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60) from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (1,2,3,5))

property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60) from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (1,2,5))

property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: (select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60) from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (6))

property.name: sqlForColumn
property.value: CASE ISNULL((select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60 )from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (1,2,3,5)),0) WHEN 0 THEN 100 ELSE (select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60 )from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (3)) /(select sum((ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.preparetime,0)+(ISNULL(DT_JOB_PLAN.unittime,0)*ISNULL(DH_JOB.quantity_plan,0)))/60 )from DT_JOB_PLAN,DH_JOB where DH_JOB.id_order=MAIN.ID and DH_JOB.id = DT_JOB_PLAN.id and DH_JOB.type_exec in (1,2,3,5)) *100 END
